attributes.action: provide exact details of why this country will benefit more by continuing its EU membership?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the Prime Minister in providing the exact details of why this country will benefit more by continuing its EU membership, quoting the ‘real economic figures’ since 1973 – if possible?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
